about.title: About Us
about.lead1: VANMO is a technology and urban mobility company focused on solving real problems with fast, scalable, and sustainable digital solutions.
about.lead2: We operate at the intersection of software, smart cities, and electric micromobility, helping organizations innovate efficiently, with lower costs and greater environmental and social impact.

tech.title: Software Development
tech.description: We create digital applications in an agile, secure, and scalable way, reducing development time and operating costs.

card2.title: Why Low Code & Vibe Code
items: Ideal for startups, companies, and the public sector
card2.cta: I want to develop a digital solution

mobility.title: Urban Mobility with
mobility.description: We design and implement complete electric micromobility solutions, going far beyond simply offering bicycles.

corporate.title: Corporate Mobility
corporate.desc: Solutions for internal employee commuting in large companies and condominiums.

public.title: Cities and Public Projects
public.desc: Bike-sharing systems integrated with public urban mobility policies.

universities.title: Universities and Campuses
universities.desc: Sustainable mobility within large university campuses and research centers.

logistics.title: Short-Distance Urban Logistics
logistics.desc: Electric bikes for fast and sustainable deliveries in urban centers.

tourism.title: Tourism and Sustainable Economy
tourism.desc: Electric bike rentals for tourists and sustainable tourism projects.

portfolio.title: Our Portfolio
portfolio.description: Discover some of the projects that transformed the reality of our partners.

projects.title: Fleet Management System
projects.desc: Complete platform for real-time monitoring of corporate electric bikes.

projects.title: Connected City
projects.desc: Bike-sharing system integrated with a real-time urban indicators dashboard.

projects.title: Environmental Dashboard
projects.desc: Environmental impact dashboard with metrics on avoided CO₂ and kilometers traveled.

integration.title: Where Technology and Mobility Meet
integration.description: VANMO's differentiator is uniting software + urban mobility in integrated solutions.
integration.subtitle: Practical Examples
items: Apps for electric bike fleet management
Dashboards with usage and environmental impact data
Reservation, ticketing, access, and control systems
Integration with QR Code, NFC, GPS, and IoT
Data for corporate and public decision-making
integration.strong: All designed for scale, efficiency, and real impact.

callout.title: Complete Integration
callout.subtitle: Software + Hardware + Data
callout.desc: We connect all parts of the urban mobility ecosystem into a single smart platform.

corporate.title: Corporate Mobility
corporate.desc: Cost reduction with internal travel, real-time usage data, and encouraging sustainable culture.

smart_cities.title: Urban Projects and Smart Cities
smart_cities.desc: Micromobility solutions integrated with digital systems, with clear environmental and social impact metrics.

startups.title: Startups and Innovation
startups.desc: Rapid MVPs to validate ideas, test business models, and scale mobility solutions.

clients.title: Who is VANMO for
